option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
updatedContent
option.value:
### Task API Examples ### Base URL: http://localhost:8080
### 1. Get all tasks for a project GET http://localhost:8080/api/projects/1/tasks Accept: application/json
###
### 2. Get task by ID GET http://localhost:8080/api/tasks/1 Accept: application/json
###
### 3. Create a new task (TODO status) POST http://localhost:8080/api/projects/1/tasks Content-Type: application/json
{ "title": "Design database schema", "description": "Create ERD and database schema for the application", "status": "TODO" }
###
### 4. Create a task in IN_PROGRESS status POST http://localhost:8080/api/projects/1/tasks Content-Type: application/json
{ "title": "Implement REST API endpoints", "description": "Develop RESTful API for project and task management", "status": "IN_PROGRESS" }
###
### 5. Create a task in DONE status POST http://localhost:8080/api/projects/1/tasks Content-Type: application/json
{ "title": "Setup Spring Boot project", "description": "Initialize Spring Boot application with dependencies", "status": "DONE" }
###
### 6. Create multiple tasks for project 2 POST http://localhost:8080/api/projects/2/tasks Content-Type: application/json
{ "title": "Design UI mockups", "description": "Create wireframes and mockups for mobile app", "status": "TODO" }
###
POST http://localhost:8080/api/projects/2/tasks Content-Type: application/json
{ "title": "Setup CI/CD pipeline", "description": "Configure automated build and deployment", "status": "IN_PROGRESS" }
###
### 7. Update task status PUT http://localhost:8080/api/tasks/1 Content-Type: application/json
{ "title": "Design database schema", "description": "Create ERD and database schema for the application", "status": "IN_PROGRESS" }
###
### 8. Update task to DONE PUT http://localhost:8080/api/tasks/2 Content-Type: application/json
{ "title": "Implement REST API endpoints", "description": "Developed and tested all RESTful API endpoints", "status": "DONE" }
###
### 9. Update task title and description PUT http://localhost:8080/api/tasks/3 Content-Type: application/json
{ "title": "Setup Spring Boot project - Updated", "description": "Initialized Spring Boot application with Maven, JPA, and H2 database", "status": "DONE" }
###
### 10. Delete a task DELETE http://localhost:8080/api/tasks/1
###
